member.name: M:Zek.Extensions.Collections.IEnumerableExtensions.DistinctBy``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1},System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer{``1})
member.summary: Returns all distinct elements of the given source, where "distinctness" is determined via a projection and the specified comparer for the projected type.
member.remarks: This operator uses deferred execution and streams the results, although a set of already-seen keys is retained. If a key is seen multiple times, only the first element with that key is returned.
member.param: The equality comparer to use to determine whether or not keys are equal. If null, the default equality comparer for TSource is used.
member.returns: A sequence consisting of distinct elements from the source sequence, comparing them by the specified key projection.

member.name: M:Zek.Extensions.StringExtensions.Left(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the left side of a string.
member.param: Required. String expression from which the leftmost characters are returned

Required. Integer expression. Numeric expression indicating how many characters to return. If 0, a zero-length string ("") is returned. If greater than or equal to the number of characters in str, the entire string is returned.
member.returns: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the left side of a string.

member.param: Required. String expression from which the rightmost characters are returned.

member.returns: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the right side of a string.

member.name: P:Zek.Model.DTO.Ecomm.GetTransactionResultResponseDTO.Secure3DText

member.summary: Registering DMS authorization / Регистрация DMS авторизации

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.RegisterDmsAuthorizationAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registering DMS authorization / Регистрация DMS авторизации
member.returns: transaction identifier (28 characters in base64 encoding). In case of an error, the returned string of symbols begins with ‘error:‘.

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.ExecuteDmsTransactionAsync(System.String,System.Int32,Zek.ISO4217.ISO4217,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executing a DMS transaction / Выполнение DMS транзакции
member.returns:
RESULT: result RESULT_CODE: result_code RRN: rrn APPROVAL_CODE: app_code CARD_NUMBER pan
result – transaction results: OK – successful transaction, FAILED – failed transaction result_code – transaction result code returned from Card Suite Processing RTPS(3 digits) rrn – retrieval reference number returned from Card Suite Processing RTPS(12 characters) app_code – approval code returned from Card Suite Processing RTPS(max 6 characters) pan – masked card number
Example of the result: RESULT: OK RESULT_CODE: 000 RRN: 123456789012 APPROVAL_CODE: 123456 CARD_NUMBER: 9***********9999

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.ExecuteDmsTransactionAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executing a DMS transaction / Выполнение DMS транзакции
member.returns:
RESULT: result RESULT_CODE: result_code RRN: rrn APPROVAL_CODE: app_code CARD_NUMBER pan
result – transaction results: OK – successful transaction, FAILED – failed transaction result_code – transaction result code returned from Card Suite Processing RTPS(3 digits) rrn – retrieval reference number returned from Card Suite Processing RTPS(12 characters) app_code – approval code returned from Card Suite Processing RTPS(max 6 characters) pan – masked card number
Example of the result: RESULT: OK RESULT_CODE: 000 RRN: 123456789012 APPROVAL_CODE: 123456 CARD_NUMBER: 9***********9999

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.GetTransactionResultAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.returns: RESULT: OK RESULT_PS: FINISHED RESULT_CODE: 000 3DSECURE: ATTEMPTED RRN: 123456789012 APPROVAL_CODE: 123456 CARD_NUMBER: 9***********9999 RECC_PMNT_ID: 1258 RECC_PMNT_EXPIRY: 1108

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.ReverseAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: რევერსალი უბრუნებს თანხას წარმატებით საკომისიოს გარეშე იმავე დღეს. მეორე დღეს უკვე მუშავდება როგორც რეფანდი. გამოიყენება პროგრამული/სისტემური შეცდომის დროს. Transaction reversal / Откат транзакции
member.param: suspected_fraud необязательный параметр – флаг, указывающий, что откат делается из-за подозрения в мошенничестве.В таких случаях значение этого параметра должно быть установлено в "да". Если этот параметр используется, возможен откат только полной суммы.

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.RefundAsync(System.String)
member.summary: რეფანდი არის ფინანსურად შესრულებული ოპერაციის თანხის ფინანსურად დაბრუნება, გადარიცხვის საკომისიოს გათვალისწინებით. ძირითადად კლიენტის მოთხოვნით. Transaction refund / Возврат суммы транзакции

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.CloseDayAsync

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.RegisterRegularPaymentAsync(System.Int32,Zek.ISO4217.ISO4217,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Request for SMS transaction/DMS authorization registration
member.param: transaction amount in fractional units, mandatory (up to 12 digits)
preferred deadline for a regular payment MMYY

If recurring payment for current client (card) is already defined for template, it needs to be overwritten. Overwriting recurring payments can be done by specifying additional parameter perspayee_overwrite=1. In this case all existing recurring payments for template defined for current client (card) will be deleted.

member.name: M:Zek.Services.EcommService.RegisterRegularPaymentAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Request for SMS transaction/DMS authorization registration / регистрации регулярного платежа авторизацией с первого платежа:
member.param: transaction amount in fractional units, mandatory (up to 12 digits)
preferred deadline for a regular payment MMYY

If recurring payment for current client (card) is already defined for template, it needs to be overwritten. Overwriting recurring payments can be done by specifying additional parameter perspayee_overwrite=1. In this case all existing recurring payments for template defined for current client (card) will be deleted.

member.name: T:Zek.Utils.NamedLock
member.summary: Synchronization helper: a static lock collection associated with a key. NamedLock manages the lifetime of critical sections that can be accessed by a key (name) throughout the application. It also have some helper methods to allow a maximum wait time (timeout) to aquire the lock and safelly release it. Note: this nuget package contains c# source code and depends on System.Collections.Concurrent introduced in .Net 4.0.

member.name: M:Zek.Utils.NamedLock.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Check if a lock was aquired.

member.summary: Tries to aquire a lock respecting the specified timeout.
member.returns: If the lock was aquired in the specified timeout

member.name: M:Zek.Utils.NamedLock.Enter(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Tries to aquire a lock respecting the specified timeout.
member.returns: If the lock was aquired in the specified timeout

member.name: M:Zek.Utils.NamedLock.Exit
member.summary: Releases the lock if it was already aquired. Called also at "Dispose".

member.summary: Creates a new instance and tries to aquire a lock.

member.summary: Creates a new instance and tries to aquire a lock.

member.summary: Creates a new instance and tries to aquire a lock.

member.name: M:Zek.Utils.NamedLock.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources. Releases aquired lock and related resources.

member.name: M:Zek.Web.HtmlHelperExtensions.PartialFor``2(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper{``0},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,``1}})
member.summary: Return Partial View. The element naming convention is maintained in the partial view by setting the prefix name from the expression. The name of the view (by default) is the class name of the Property or a UIHint("partial name"). @Html.PartialFor(m => m.Address) - partial view name is the class name of the Address property.
member.param: Model expression for the prefix name (m => m.Address)
member.returns: Partial View as Mvc string

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.CanBeNullAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the value of the marked element could be null sometimes, so the check for null is necessary before its usage.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.NotNullAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the value of the marked element could never be null.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseKindFlags.Access
member.summary: Only entity marked with attribute considered used.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseKindFlags.Assign
member.summary: Indicates implicit assignment to a member.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseKindFlags.InstantiatedWithFixedConstructorSignature
member.summary: Indicates implicit instantiation of a type with fixed constructor signature. That means any unused constructor parameters won't be reported as such.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseKindFlags.InstantiatedNoFixedConstructorSignature
member.summary: Indicates implicit instantiation of a type.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseTargetFlags
member.summary: Specify what is considered used implicitly when marked with or .

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseTargetFlags.Members
member.summary: Members of entity marked with attribute are considered used.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Annotations.ImplicitUseTargetFlags.WithMembers
member.summary: Entity marked with attribute and all its members considered used.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.UsedImplicitlyAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the marked symbol is used implicitly (e.g. via reflection, in external library), so this symbol will not be marked as unused (as well as by other usage inspections).

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.MeansImplicitUseAttribute
member.summary: Should be used on attributes and causes ReSharper to not mark symbols marked with such attributes as unused (as well as by other usage inspections)

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.PublicAPIAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is intended to mark publicly available API which should not be removed and so is treated as used.
